statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content:
Given an sequence of numbers {X1, X2, ... , Xn}, where Xk = (A * k + B) % mod. Your task is to find the maximum sub sequence {Y1, Y2, ... , Ym} where every pair of (Yi, Yj) satisfies Yi + Yj <= L (1 �� i < j �� m), and every Yi <= L (1 �� i �� m ).
Now given n, L, A, B and mod, your task is to figure out the maximum m described above.

statement.title: Input
statement.content: Multiple test cases, process to the end of input. Every test case has a single line. A line of 5 integers: n, L, A, B and mod. (1 �� n �� 2*10<sup>7</sup>, 1 �� L �� 2*10<sup>9</sup>, 1 �� A, B, mod �� 10<sup>9</sup>)

statement.title: Output
statement.content: For each case, output m in one line.
